::FZ/Zardus::

FZ flies up to the Iron Fist, the shields flickering off. He motions 
for the bots waiting around to enter, and then flies inside. He walks 
to the bridge.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus stands up, looking at FZ as he enters. The data that FZ needed 
to be close to download is quickly downloaded into Zardus's 
datatracks. The orb in Zardus's hand flickers, mentally ordering him 
to leave FZ in charge and go to the lab. Zardus turns without a word, 
walking off to the lab.
